channel.title: App on Souhrud's Website
channel.description: Recent content in App on Souhrud's Website

item.title: App Development
item.description: UPI Viewer: A simple frontend for a UPI Powered Point of Sale System - Without using any external services or APIs! Written in Kotlin, it makes phones as old as Android 4.2 into a fully functional minimal Point of Sale machine with features like “Dynamic QR Generator”, " Split the Bill" mode, etc. Project Link Website This is ZeusInstitute OSS’s first big project. I want to try to get it on F-Droid after alpha and try to get it on Play Store after stable release.
